title: 9-year-old girl wounded, man killed in Roxbury shootings
content:
To view this page ensure that Adobe Flash Player version 10.2.0 or greater is installed.
A 9-year-old girl was injured and a man murdered in overnight shootings in Roxbury, police say.
The child was shot at approximately 1 a.m. on Annunciation Road, near Boston police headquarters.
Department spokesman Officer Stephen McNulty said her injuries are not life-threatening.
There is a park in the area; however, McNulty said it was not immediately clear where the girl was shot.
Meanwhile, an adult male was fatally shot shortly before 11 p.m. last night, also in Roxbury, McNulty said.
